name: The Bruh Shrine
description:
Hello and welcome to the Bruh Shrine!

The bruh shrine is an unpublished website (bc it costs money  D:   ) that contains... um... a lot of bruh moments-

yea basically its just many different pages with fun little things like an ant-sized image of bruh, a comically large picture of bruh, the home page, but in romanian, and much more! (also, theres a hidden page! Hint: its in the rickroll. Not gonna tell you where the rickroll is tho. It's kinda a secret inside a secret! :o)

By the way, put your ideas in the comments, I might add them!

(v4)
